  <main class="site-content">
   <div aria-label="Search" aria-modal="true" class="search-overlay" id="searchoverlay" role="dialog">
    <div class="search-overlay-inner">
     <a href="#">
      <span aria-label="Close" class="search-overlay-close-button">
       <span aria-hidden="true" class="icon icon-close01">
       </span>
      </span>
     </a>
     <form action="/search/" class="search-form search-overlay-form">
      <input autocomplete="off" class="search-input" id="search-input" name="q" placeholder="search" type="search" value=""/>
      <label class="search-label" for="search-input">
       Type keyword(s) to search
      </label>
     </form>
     <div class="search-overlay-autosuggest">
      <ul class="search-overlay-autosuggest-list">
      </ul>
     </div>
    </div>

        <div class="custom-item interview-rick-hale-clockwright-wood-clockmaker column-right">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image" data-vars-cta="Watches" data-vars-position="1" href="/watches/a35194375/interview-rick-hale-clockwright-wood-clockmaker/">

          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Watches" data-vars-position="1" href="/watches/a35194375/interview-rick-hale-clockwright-wood-clockmaker/">
            How a Young Artist Is Building Giant Wooden Clocks in Michigan
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            <p>
             We interview Rick Hale of Clockwright on his brilliant, horological woodwork.
            </p>

           </span>
          </div>
         </div>

       <div class="feed-block-column">
        <div class="feed-block-column-content" data-vars-block-curation="Section" data-vars-block-id="" data-vars-block-slot="7" data-vars-block-type="Big Story Feed Block">
         <div class="custom-item aquastar-deepstar-re-edition-dive-watch column-right">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Watches" data-vars-position="2" href="/watches/a34225845/aquastar-deepstar-re-edition-dive-watch/">

           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Watches" data-vars-position="2" href="/watches/a34225845/aquastar-deepstar-re-edition-dive-watch/">
             Review: The Aquastar Deepstar Re-Edition
            </a>
            <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
             <p>
              Little-known but highly valued, the Aquastar Deepstar is a vintage dive watch classic, and it's returned in upgraded form.
             </p>
            </div>
            <span class="custom-item-meta">
            </span>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="custom-item montblanc-1858-split-second-chronograph-le-18-watch-lime-gold column-right">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Watches" data-vars-position="3" href="/watches/a35878652/montblanc-1858-split-second-chronograph-le-18-watch-lime-gold/">
            <img alt="mont blanc" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mont-blanc-1858-lead-1616159464.jpg?crop=0.394xw:0.788xh;0.319xw,0.0353xh&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mont-blanc-1858-lead-1616159464.jpg?crop=0.394xw:0.788xh;0.319xw,0.0353xh&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mont-blanc-1858-lead-1616159464.jpg?crop=0.394xw:0.788xh;0.319xw,0.0353xh&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mont-blanc-1858-lead-1616159464.jpg?crop=0.394xw:0.788xh;0.319xw,0.0353xh&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/mont-blanc-1858-lead-1616159464.jpg?crop=0.394xw:0.788xh;0.319xw,0.0353xh&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="Mont Blanc"/>
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Watches" data-vars-position="3" href="/watches/a35878652/montblanc-1858-split-second-chronograph-le-18-watch-lime-gold/">
             This Lime Gold Chronograph Is Wildly Exotic
            </a>

         <div class="custom-item best-watch-tools column-right">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Watches" data-vars-position="4" href="/watches/g34536300/best-watch-tools/">
            <img alt="watch tools" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/watch-tools-lead-1604520934.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.319xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/watch-tools-lead-1604520934.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.319xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/watch-tools-lead-1604520934.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.319xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/watch-tools-lead-1604520934.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.319xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/watch-tools-lead-1604520934.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.319xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Watches" data-vars-position="4" href="/watches/g34536300/best-watch-tools/">
             The Tools You Need For Your Watch
            </a>
            <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
             <p>
              There are just a few tools that watch wearers truly require...and a few more that maybe you want.
             </p>
            </div>
            <span class="custom-item-meta">
            </span>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="custom-item best-sinn-watches column-right">
          <div class="custom-item-inner">
           <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Watches" data-vars-position="5" href="/watches/a427942/best-sinn-watches/">
            <span class="lqip lazyload" data-expand="2000" data-lqip="https://hips.hearstapps.com/amv-prod-gp.s3.amazonaws.com/gearpatrol/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/Influential-Sinn-Watches-gear-patrol-lead-feature.gif?crop=0.7692307692307693xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=480:*&amp;frame=1&amp;lqip=yes">
            </span>
            <img alt="Influential-Sinn-Watches-gear-patrol-lead-feature" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/amv-prod-gp.s3.amazonaws.com/gearpatrol/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/Influential-Sinn-Watches-gear-patrol-lead-feature.gif?crop=0.7692307692307693xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/amv-prod-gp.s3.amazonaws.com/gearpatrol/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/Influential-Sinn-Watches-gear-patrol-lead-feature.gif?crop=0.7692307692307693xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/amv-prod-gp.s3.amazonaws.com/gearpatrol/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/Influential-Sinn-Watches-gear-patrol-lead-feature.gif?crop=0.7692307692307693xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/amv-prod-gp.s3.amazonaws.com/gearpatrol/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/Influential-Sinn-Watches-gear-patrol-lead-feature.gif?crop=0.7692307692307693xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/amv-prod-gp.s3.amazonaws.com/gearpatrol/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/Influential-Sinn-Watches-gear-patrol-lead-feature.gif?crop=0.7692307692307693xw:1xh;center,top&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title="Influential-Sinn-Watches-gear-patrol-lead-feature"/>
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-content">
            <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Watches" data-vars-position="5" href="/watches/a427942/best-sinn-watches/">
             5 Legendary Tool Watches and the Man Behind Them
            </a>

             <p>
              Helmut Sinn created the brand most associated with tough German watchmaking.
             </p>

         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Food &amp; Drink" data-vars-position="4" href="/food/a33459683/how-to-cook-japanese-a5-wagyu-steak/">
           <img alt="guide to life wagyu" class="lazyload lazyimage" data-sizes="auto" data-src="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/con-20-047-cmpgn-g2l-illo-web-index-comp01-1596048457.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.353xw,0&amp;resize=180:*" data-srcset="https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/con-20-047-cmpgn-g2l-illo-web-index-comp01-1596048457.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.353xw,0&amp;resize=90:* 90w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/con-20-047-cmpgn-g2l-illo-web-index-comp01-1596048457.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.353xw,0&amp;resize=180:* 180w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/con-20-047-cmpgn-g2l-illo-web-index-comp01-1596048457.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.353xw,0&amp;resize=270:* 270w,https://hips.hearstapps.com/hmg-prod.s3.amazonaws.com/images/con-20-047-cmpgn-g2l-illo-web-index-comp01-1596048457.jpg?crop=0.502xw:1.00xh;0.353xw,0&amp;resize=360:* 360w" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7" title=""/>
          </a>
          <div class="custom-item-content">

          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Home" data-vars-position="1" href="/home/a528917/how-to-keep-coffee-fresh/">
            The Best Way to Keep Coffee Fresh Is Secretly the Easiest
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            <p>

          <div class="custom-item-content">
           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Tech" data-vars-position="1" href="/tech/audio/a35407650/what-does-hi-fi-mean-experts-explain/">
            What Does Hi-Fi Even Mean Anymore? This Is What the Experts Say
           </a>
           <div class="custom-item-dek item-dek">
            <p>
             The modern definition of hi-fi is a bit ambiguous. Is it CD or vinyl quality? Or is it something even higher resolution than that?
            </p>
           </div>

           </span>
          </div>

     <div class="feed-block feed-block-3-column feed-block-with-heading feed-block-single-source" data-block-template="3-column">
      <div class="feed-block-header 3-column-block-heading">
       <h2 class="feed-block-heading">
        <a href="/deals/">
         Today's Top Deals
        </a>
       </h2>
      </div>
      <div class="feed-block-column feed-block-column-left">
       <div class="feed-block-column-content" data-vars-block-curation="Section" data-vars-block-id="b2717efd-0f6e-4e81-9a17-f394d5a39f8d" data-vars-block-slot="15" data-vars-block-type="3 Column Block">
        <div class="custom-item design-within-reach-semi-annual-sale image-left">
         <div class="custom-item-inner">
          <a class="custom-item-image custom-item-image-1x1" data-vars-cta="Today's Top Deals" data-vars-position="1" href="/deals/g35812558/design-within-reach-semi-annual-sale/">

   ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/gearpatrol/assets/css/homepage.e18181c.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/gearpatrol/assets/css/homepage-mobile.18d2bda.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
  </script>
